body.name: GRÄVEND Extra Large Gel Seat Cushion for Long Seating Pressure Relief, 2" Inch Thick Office Chair Cushion, Car Seat Driver, Wheelchairs Egg Sitting pad for Hip & Back Pain, Non Slip Ties
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 23 hrs 42 mins
features: EXCEPTIONAL SUPPORT WITH ULTRA-THICK DESIGN: Experience unbeatable support with our 2.0-inch thick cushion, designed to provide outstanding comfort for your tailbone, lower back, lumbar region, hips, and buttocks. It's ideal for extended periods of sitting, relieving you from uncomfortable pressure and ensuring maximum comfort.

OPTIMAL COOLNESS AND BREATHABILITY: Our orthopedic comfort cushion is engineered with an innovative Octagonal structure, designed to evenly distribute weight and improve air circulation. This design guarantees a refreshing and well-ventilated experience, minimizing perspiration and unpleasant odors to deliver the utmost comfort.

ENHANCE YOUR HOME OFFICE SETUP WITH THE ERGONOMIC GEL SEAT CUSHION - Elevate your work-from-home experience with the Ergonomic Gel Seat Cushion. Crafted to enhance concentration and minimize discomfort, this cushion can be seamlessly incorporated into your desk chair, gaming chair, or any seating arrangement requiring additional support. Its self-cooling gel feature also guarantees enduring firmness and stability, ensuring your day remains comfortable and productive.

FEATURING NON-SLIP CUSHION TIES: Our seat cushion designed for relief from discomfort comes with optional non-slip cushion ties, providing a secure and comfortable seating experience. Say goodbye to cushion slipping!
365-DAY GUARANTEE - Shop with peace of mind! We offer a full refund or replacement within one year from the date of purchase if you are unsatisfied for any reason.
body.description: Are you fed up with those small, uncomfortable gel cushions that don't provide enough support? Look no further than Our Enhanced High-Grade Gel Cushion with Double Thickness, specifically designed to offer you maximum comfort and support. Bid farewell to discomfort and those pesky pressure points as this cushion offers plenty of space and plushness. In search of something lightweight and portable? Our gel seat cushion is the versatile solution you've been seeking. It's suitable for a wide range of settings, including office chairs, dining chairs, car rides, air travel, stadium seats, picnics, and even sitting on the floor. Its lightweight and flexible design make it incredibly convenient for use wherever you need it. Say goodbye to pain and discomfort for good. Our office chair cushion is your trusted companion for relief from lower back, sciatic nerve, tailbone, coccyx, buttock, and hip pain. Its ergonomic design not only helps prevent numbness in your buttock muscles but also reduces lumbar strain. Stay cool and comfortable with our seat cushion. It features a therapeutic thick Octagonal gel design that enhances airflow, ensuring the ultimate in cooling comfort. Forget about seat sweat, and the ventilated mesh cover remains cool, setting it apart from traditional memory foam models. Worried about water damage? Our gel seat pad is incredibly versatile and can be used while bathing, swimming, boating, kayaking, or even kneeling while gardening. What's more, our gel seat cushion material is crafted from 100% recyclable and eco-friendly materials, making it safe for kids and pets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is THE One
reviews.reviewText: Rather than buying that expensive one that is like this, I chose this. Obviously, to save money, but also because I could tell it was going to be a lot like that other brand that costs an arm and a leg.Mine got misplaced, but Amazon took care of it and had a replacment sent right away.Ever since I got it, I've been using it for my computer chair. What I've noticed is, I sit up straighter. It is quite comfortable. I sit at my desk for hours at a time. This cushion really helps with keeping my back from hurting from hunching down.I'm definitely a happy camper and feel like I'm the winner as I didn't have to fork out over $100 for the other one. As far as I'm concerned, this is the one best for me and my pocket book.Original Review Done: 6/04/2023

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm a senior & the oomph had gone out of my leather TV chair, so I got this cushion - what a good investment! I put it under a small quilted cover & it makes my chair so comfy & adds a bit to the seat height, which I needed. Now I need to get another one for the hardback chair I use when I take zoom classes - no more fanny fatigue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome product. a real win, win
reviews.reviewText: My 90 year old mother in law loves it. She has much less pain from sitting and the extra height solved her issues with getting out of her recliner. which was the ONLY reason I purchased this for her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good peoduct - bad measurement
reviews.reviewText: The fabric seems really sturdy, and the color was a shown. Should hold up well outside. I was not, however, able to use it for my intended purpose. It had not been measured and cut correctly. The angle at which it had been cut meant the loss of a few inches of usuable material. I did not want to request a replacement not knowing if it might be an issue again & I needed to complete my project ASAP. I will try to use it for another purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the cushion to improve the seating quality of my office chair where I spend many hours working with my PC. After using it for a few weeks, I am unable to sit on it for more than a few minutes without getting very uncomfortable.

reviews.reviewText: Needed to replace my old seat cushion. Don't like memory foam as it sometimes loses it elasticity. The rubbery cushions do not have that issue. Like the straps that hold it in place.
